description: Explore the intersection of politics, celebrity endorsements, and NFTs through the surprising support of Donald Trump by digital artist Squiggle. Discover how this innovative medium reshapes political discourse and artistic expression.
keywords: NFTs, Celebrity Endorsements, Squiggle, Donald Trump, Digital Art, Political Discourse, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, Art and Politics
title: The Unexpected Twist in Celebrity Endorsements: Squiggle's Surprising Support for Trump through NFTs
